column1: Little Goat Diner////Fun spot - fun menu - great staff.  We went with a big group (12?) - they handled the situation really well.  Good beer selection
column4: I had the Goat Almighty burger - awesomely large
column5: but tasty.  I finished most of it! All the dishes around the table were a hit - chicken pot pie
column7: etc.  We shared a peach pie/cobbler. Very good.  Pricing was reasonable.
